content: the star stitch makes this crochet hat pattern feel extra special and the double brim makes it twice as cozy this pattern includes a video stitch tutorial > this pattern is part of the advent > calendar mystery crochet along 2024 to > make last minute crochet gifts for > your loved ones or yourself this is > only 1 of the 24 patterns and 12 stitch tutorials in the > advent calendar mystery crochet along > but only 12 patterns will be made > available for free on nicki s homemade > crafts with ads > and the only way to get all 24 > patterns + 12 stitch tutorials with videos ad-free and printer-friendly > is in the **ebook** the **ebook** > will be on sale until december 24th > 2024 **the code gifts10 will save you $10 between december 1st and 24th > 2024 ** then the price will go back > up to the regular price so take > advantage if you want to get all the > patterns even ad-free and > printer-friendly >**get the ebook here 1 ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in out > membership the crochet club which includes over > 500 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can get more info and join the membership here 2 1 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-last-minute-gifts-vol3/ ref=dec14pattern 2 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/
